title: The phoenix as it hath beene sundry times acted by the Children of Paules, and presented before his Maiestie.
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for A[rthur], I[ohnson], [sic] and are to be solde at the signe of the white horse in Paules-Churchyard,
notes: First word of title is xylographic.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
